item.title: Space Invaders in JavaScript
item.description: If you take a look at theExperiments Page you'll see that there's a new entry - Space Invaders. Space Invaders is a great little game to code if you're learning a new language or technology (and JavaScript is still very much in that category for me). I'll be writing up how I made the game on the CodeProject soon enough (if you're interested you can see how I made the starfield background in JavaScript).

item.title: Introducing Experiments
